meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tree</radical> <radical>can</radical> be a <radical>tree</radical>, but it can also be a <radical>psychopath</radical>. The tree goes from being a regular tree to being a psychopath. Such mood swings are so rough. Especially when the tree slips to <kanji>gloom</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: Then the tree switches from <kanji>gloom</kanji> to being super excited (these moodswings!). The super excited tree starts doing dubstep. <reading>Uts</reading> (うつ) uts uts uts uts ♬.
